Name: Bhimrao Amberdkar
Quote: I measure the progress of a community by the degree of progress which women have achieved.

Name: Bhimrao Amberdkar
Quote: Cultivation of mind should be the ultimate aim of human existence.

Name: Bhimrao Amberdkar
Quote: I measure the progress of a community by the degree of progress which women have achieved.

Name: Bhimrao Amberdkar
Quote: I measure the progress of a community by the degree of progress which women have achieved.

Name: Bhimrao Amberdkar
Quote: Caste is not a physical object like a wall of bricks or a line of barbed wire which prevents the Hindus from co-mingling and which has, therefore, to be pulled down. Caste is a notion; it is a state of the mind.
